welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Langenberg, a charming city known for its picturesque landscapes, historical landmarks, and friendly locals. We hope you will enjoy your time here and take the opportunity to explore all that our beautiful city has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Düsseldorf International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Düsseldorf International Airport, primarily used for low-cost carriers.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: A newer terminal at Düsseldorf International Airport, primarily used for international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but a premium option is also offered for faster speeds.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Dortmund Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
